member.name: E:Dawnx.Xml.XPathContext.Monitor
member.summary: This event has the source arguments that are available before the defined function is called. And it is called when the function defined in the context is called.

member.name: P:Dawnx.Xml.XPathContext.ArgList
member.summary: Gets all the defined argumennts in the context.

member.name: M:Dawnx.Xml.XPathContext.PreserveWhitespace(System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator)
member.summary: Evaluates whether to preserve white space nodes or strip them for the given context.

member.name: M:Dawnx.Xml.XPathContext.CompareDocument(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Compares the base Uniform Resource Identifiers (URIs) of two documents based upon the order the documents were loaded by the XSLT processor (that is, the System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform class)

member.name: P:Dawnx.Xml.XPathContext.Whitespace
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether to include white space nodes in the output.

member.name: M:Dawnx.Xml.XPathContext.ResolveFunction(System.String,System.String,System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType[])
member.summary: Resolves a function reference and returns an representing the function. The is used at execution time to get the return value of the function.

member.name: M:Dawnx.Xml.XPathContext.ResolveVariable(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Resolves a variable reference and returns an System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextVariable representing the variable.

member.name: M:Dawnx.Xml.XPathContext.AddNamespace(System.String)
member.summary: Adds the given namespace to the collection for 'DefaultNamespace'.

member.name: M:Dawnx.Xml.XPathContext.AddParam(System.String,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Adds a argument to and associates it with the namespace qualified name.

member.name: M:Dawnx.Xml.XPathContext.AddParam(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Adds a argument to and associates it with empty namespace.

member.name: M:Dawnx.Xml.XPathContext.Compile(System.String)
member.summary: Compiles the XPath expression specified and returns an System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression object representing the XPath expression.

member.name: M:Dawnx.Xml.XPathFunctionAttribute.#ctor(System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType[])
member.summary: Defines a function named '{DefaultNamespace}:{FunctionName}' in the context. Project each into the function's arguments. (If you need the 'docContext', you must use a parameter to receive it.)

member.name: M:Dawnx.Xml.XPathFunctionAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType[])
member.summary: Defines a function named '{DefaultNamespace}:{$name}' in the context. Project each into the function's arguments. (If you need the 'docContext', you must use a parameter to receive it.)

member.name: M:Dawnx.Xml.XPathFunctionAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType[])
member.summary: Defines a function named '{$namespace}:{$name}' in the context. Project each into the function's arguments. (If you need the 'docContext', you must use a parameter to receive it.)
